mapper.select: SELECT rt.id as id, rt.name as name, rt.seating_capacity as seatingCapacity, rt.status as status, rt.active as active FROM restaurant_tables rt
SELECT rt.id as id, rt.name as name, rt.seating_capacity as seatingCapacity, rt.status as status, rt.active as active FROM restaurant_tables rt WHERE rt.id = #{id}
SELECT rt.id FROM restaurant_tables rt WHERE rt.seating_capacity >= #{pax} AND rt.status = 'AVAILABLE' ORDER BY rt.seating_capacity ASC LIMIT 1
